LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingAbhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingAbhorrent.description: Taking away the free will of someone, and reducing them just to manual labor is incredibly and undeniably unethical.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingAbhorrent.comps.2.descri: No one deserves to lose their free will.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingAbhorrent.comps.3.descri: It is even worse taking the free will of one of our own.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingApproved.label: Approved
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingApproved.description: It is such an increase in effeciency. And besides, its not like they care anymore, right...?
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingApproved.comps.2.descrip: It is honorable for a colonist to serve us unyieldingly. Unfortante if needed, but honorable.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingApproved.comps.3.descrip: Removing their resistance greatly increases efficiency, as well as removes some of the ambiguity of keeping an objecting person.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingNeutral.label: Neutral
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingNeutral.description: Nerve stapling is merely what it is. It is nothing exceptional to do anything to survive.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingOutsidersOnly.label: Outsiders Only
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingOutsidersOnly.descriptio: It is abhorrent to staple one of our own, but an outsider is fair game.
LanguageData.QE_NerveStaplingOutsidersOnly.comps.0.de: It is unacceptable to staple one of our own when outsiders can work for us instead.
